mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_DT AS exeDt /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CACHE_END_TM AS cacheEndTm /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_STATUS AS exeStatus /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011169(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011170(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011171(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011172(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_DT AS exeDt /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CACHE_END_TM AS cacheEndTm /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_STATUS AS exeStatus /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG.CHECK_IN_DD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG SET /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CACHE_SEARCH_LOG /* CACHE 검색 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
